author: Xaris Darras
description: “Bacardí Clandestino combines the tropical flavors of Cuba with the scent of spices, creating a refreshing and perfectly balanced drink. It is inspired by the history of the Bacardí family, when they were exiled from Cuba. The name comes from a Manu Chao song called ‘Clandestino,’ which tells the story of a man's exile from his country.”
name: Clandestino

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
